meaning_str.bing:
adj. 已婚的；婚姻的；结婚的；专心（于某事）
n. 已婚的人
v. “marry”的过去式和过去分词
网络. 结了婚的；夫妇的；有配偶的

已婚的；婚姻的；结婚的；专心（于某事）
结了婚的；夫妇的；有配偶的

已婚的；结了婚的；有配偶的；婚姻的；紧密结合的；密切相关的；联合的；合并的；专心；全神贯注
已婚人士；结婚者；已婚者
结婚；娶；嫁；缔结婚姻；把…嫁给；为…娶亲；与…成婚；为…主持婚礼；操办婚礼；（marry的过去式和过去分词）

1.en: She had a look of demure joy, recalling the married Frank or Dean (she couldn't tell us who) crooning to her over the M. R. I. machine.
1.cn: 她带着羞涩的喜悦，想起了已婚的弗兰克或者迪安（她不能告诉我们是谁），穿过核磁共振机，深情地唱歌给她听。

2.en: I can't imagine being with any other human being. I married him because he was the love of my life.
2.cn: 我简直无法想象如果和其他人结婚会是什么样子。我嫁给这个男人只因他是我今生的挚爱。

3.en: The young prince told her that when they were married, he would take her to his own kingdom.
3.cn: 年轻的王子对她说他们结婚后，要带她回去他自己的王国。

1.cn: 因为她嫁给了一个白痴。

2.en: That's why I married him. Yeah, we're sophisticated adults.
2.cn: 所以我才嫁给他了。我们是富有经验的成年人。

3.en: Okay, do you see, do you see what you're keeping me married too?
3.cn: 你看你让我嫁的是什么人？

4.en: Miss Lucas is married and settled. And one of my own daughters too.
4.cn: 卢卡斯小姐结婚后了，有了归宿了，我自己的一个女儿也出了嫁。

5.en: Monica's right. We're talking about getting married here. Okay? She can't just rush into this.
5.cn: 莫妮卡说得对，这可是婚姻大事，她不能说嫁就嫁。

6.en: Maybe I just wanted to believe you'd do the right thing. Because the man I married would have.
6.cn: 也许我只是想相信你会做正确的事，因为我嫁的男人会。

7.en: Honey, you know. I once also almost married somebody that I didn't love. Do you remember Barry?
7.cn: 坐下，宝贝，你知道吗？我也曾差一点嫁个我不爱的人。

8.en: So I moved to DC, and met the good guy, and I got married at the nearly decrepit age of 24.
8.cn: 我于是搬到哥伦比亚特区，在"老迈"的24岁找个男人嫁了。

9.en: If you wanted a husband who proved his manhood to you that way, you should've stayed back in Dallas with your mother and married the prom king.
9.cn: 你要是需要你丈夫那样对你展现阳刚之气，还不如跟你妈待在达拉斯，嫁个舞会国王。

10.en: Do you ever feel that way about Howard? Oh, that's not really a fair comparison. I'm basically married to a sexy Buzz Lightyear.
10.cn: 你对霍华德有过这种感觉吗？拿我男人跟你男人比不太公平啊，我嫁的可是性感版的巴斯光年。

11.en: Seems marvellous to me you leave service, go into government. Now you're married to a prominent man. 20th century story. I agree.
11.cn: 真是不可思议，你辞掉仆人工作，进入政府，现在嫁了一个好男人，真是二十世纪的故事。是啊。

12.en: The next time, she married for the sake of her daughters. But that man, too, was taken from her. And she was doomed to look every day upon his beloved child.
12.cn: 后来一次，她为了她女儿的利益嫁了人。但是那个男人也被死神带走了。而她注定要每天看着他心爱的孩子。

13.en: Daisy loved me when she married me, and she loves me now.
13.cn: 黛西嫁给我时就爱着我，现在也是。

14.en: Did you guys know Penny married Zack three years ago? What?
14.cn: 你们知道Penny三年前嫁给了Zack吗？啥？

15.en: Oh, hey, you guys. And this is Loretta. She's married to Paul, who's a werewolf.
15.cn: 嘿，伙计们，这是洛雷塔，她嫁给了保罗，他是个狼人。

16.en: All right. Madonna was married to this Ridgemont high alum. Oh, my god! Sean Penn!
16.cn: 好，麦当娜嫁给了哪位"开放的美国学府"子弟？我的天，肖恩·潘。

17.en: And the destination? I don't care. Whatever's the cheapest. I'm so lucky I married you.
17.cn: 目的地是？随便，最便宜的吧，我嫁给你真是太走运了哈。

18.en: You know, I met a really cute girl at work. She's married to a guy in one of our drug trials.
18.cn: 我工作时遇到了个可爱的女孩儿，她嫁给了我们那儿一位药品临床试验者。

19.en: Once upon a time, there was a beautiful young girl who married for love. And she had two loving daughters.
19.cn: 从前，有一个美丽的年轻女孩嫁给了自己心爱之人。她有两个可爱的女儿。
